tasks.task_description: Create search page layout at content/search/_index.md
Create search page template at layouts/search/list.html
Create search JavaScript module at assets/js/search.js
Update header.html to make search inputs functional
Test build process and search functionality

description: Integrate Pagefind search system with Hugo - create search page, JavaScript module, update header functionality, and add search interface components
context: Created search page content, template, and JavaScript module. The search page uses a dedicated layout with Pagefind integration, debounced search, URL parameter handling, and proper loading/empty states.
Updated header.html to make both desktop and mobile search inputs functional by wrapping them in forms that submit to /search with query parameter. This enables the search redirection requirement.
Build process completed successfully. Pagefind indexed 212 pages and 3530 words. The search integration is ready for testing with the development server already running.
